pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, December 7, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception organized by the Equal Voice Foundation, to recognize the 100th anniversary of the first woman elected to the House of Commons. The Minister for Women and Gender Equality and Youth Marci Ien will deliver remarks at the reception.

Closed to media

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend an induction ceremony for former Canadian ambassador to France Isabelle Hudon, who will be inducted into the Légion d’honneur at the distinction of Commander by the Government of France.

42 Sussex Drive
Embassy of France   

Note for media:

  • Media wishing to cover the event can contact the Embassy of France in Ottawa by calling 613-408-7097.
